definition: A set of numbers arranged in a particular order.
example: He studied the series of numbers to find the pattern.
example_translation: Przestudiował serię liczb, aby znaleźć wzór.

definition: A collection of distinct numbers.
example: The set of numbers included both positive and negative integers.
example_translation: Zbiór liczb obejmował zarówno liczby dodatnie, jak i ujemne.

definition: An ordered list of numbers following a particular pattern.
example: The sequence of numbers increases by three each time.
example_translation: Sekwencja liczb zwiększa się o trzy za każdym razem.

definition: An arrangement of numbers or items in a meaningful or important sequence.
example: The data was arranged in a significant order to highlight the trends.
example_translation: Dane zostały uporządkowane w porządku znaczącym, aby podkreślić trendy.

definition: A number multiplied by itself.
example: Four squared is sixteen.
example_translation: Cztery do kwadratu to szesnaście.

definition: Numbers that are not divisible by two.
example: One, three, and five are odd numbers.
example_translation: Jeden, trzy i pięć to liczby nieparzyste.

definition: Numbers that are divisible by two.
example: Two, four, and six are even numbers.
example_translation: Dwa, cztery i sześć to liczby parzyste.

definition: Numbers greater than one that have no positive divisors other than one and themselves.
example: Two, three, and five are prime numbers.
example_translation: Dwa, trzy i pięć to liczby pierwsze.

definition: Separated into parts by a specified number.
example: Fifteen divided by three is five.
example_translation: Piętnaście podzielone przez trzy to pięć.

definition: Except for; besides.
example: Apart from the weather, the trip was great.
example_translation: Poza pogodą, wycieczka była świetna.

definition: The greatest amount or degree possible.
example: The maximum temperature today is 30°C.
example_translation: Maksymalna temperatura dzisiaj to 30°C.

definition: The least or smallest amount or degree possible.
example: The minimum requirement for this job is a bachelor's degree.
example_translation: Minimalne wymaganie na to stanowisko to stopień licencjata.

definition: The greatest in amount, degree, or rank.
example: She reached the highest score in the exam.
example_translation: Osiągnęła najwyższy wynik na egzaminie.

definition: The smallest in amount, degree, or rank.
example: The lowest temperature recorded this winter was -15°C.
example_translation: Najniższa temperatura zarejestrowana tej zimy to -15°C.

definition: Nearly correct or exact; close in value but not precise.
example: The approximate distance between the two cities is 200 miles.
example_translation: Przybliżona odległość między tymi dwoma miastami wynosi 200 mil.

definition: Not exact but close enough to be useful or reasonable.
example: Her estimate was roughly correct.
example_translation: Jej szacunek był z grubsza poprawny.

definition: Exact, accurate, and careful about details.
example: We need the precise measurements for the project.
example_translation: Potrzebujemy dokładnych pomiarów do projektu.

definition: A number that is completely accurate without approximation.
example: The exact number of participants was 156.
example_translation: Dokładna liczba uczestników wynosiła 156.

definition: To collect or gather into a whole.
example: The data was aggregated to provide an overall view.
example_translation: Dane zostały zebrane, aby przedstawić ogólny widok.

word: Reached by totalling a set of numbers
definition: Obtained by adding together all the numbers in a set.
example: The final score was reached by totalling a set of numbers from each round.
example_translation: Ostateczny wynik został osiągnięty przez zsumowanie zestawu liczb z każdej rundy.

definition: The final amount after all numbers are added together.
example: The total of the bill was $45.50.
example_translation: Suma rachunku wyniosła 45,50 $.

definition: The sum of a set of numbers divided by the count of numbers in the set.
example: The average score of the class was 75%.
example_translation: Średni wynik klasy wyniósł 75%.

definition: Items or records included in a list or register.
example: All entries must be submitted by the deadline.
example_translation: Wszystkie wpisy muszą zostać przesłane przed terminem.

definition: A number that is distinct and separate; an individual entity.
example: In statistics, discrete numbers are used to represent countable items.
example_translation: W statystyce liczby dyskretne są używane do reprezentowania policzalnych elementów.

definition: A single, distinct element or quantity.
example: The unit of measurement for length is the meter.
example_translation: Jednostką miary długości jest metr.

definition: A value that does not change.
example: In mathematics, π (pi) is a constant.
example_translation: W matematyce π (pi) jest stałą.

definition: An amount or number of something.
example: The quantity of apples needed for the recipe is five.
example_translation: Ilość jabłek potrzebna do przepisu to pięć.

definition: Changed or altered, often in a continuous way.
example: The results varied depending on the conditions.
example_translation: Wyniki zmieniały się w zależności od warunków.

definition: The total number or quantity of something.
example: The amount of water in the tank is measured in liters.
example_translation: Ilość wody w zbiorniku jest mierzona w litrach.

definition: A number chosen by chance without any specific pattern.
example: A random number was selected for the lottery draw.
example_translation: Wylosowano losową liczbę do losowania loterii.

definition: The term used to refer to a numerical symbol.
example: The word figure can also mean a shape or form.
example_translation: Słowo liczba może również oznaczać kształt lub formę.

definition: To mention or allude to something.
example: The instructions refer to the previous chapter for more details.
example_translation: Instrukcje odnoszą się do poprzedniego rozdziału w celu uzyskania dodatkowych informacji.

definition: To determine a number through mathematical processes.
example: Calculate a number using the given formula.
example_translation: Oblicz liczbę za pomocą podanego wzoru.

definition: To roughly calculate or judge a number.
example: Estimate a number based on the available data.
example_translation: Oszać liczbę na podstawie dostępnych danych.

definition: To adjust a number to the nearest desired value, either higher or lower.
example: Round the number up to the nearest whole number.
example_translation: Zaokrąglij liczbę w górę do najbliższej liczby całkowitej.

definition: To add together all the numbers in a set.
example: Total a set of numbers to find the overall sum.
example_translation: Zsumuj zestaw liczb, aby znaleźć sumę całkowitą.

definition: Numbers can add up or match.
example: Ensure the numbers can tally before submitting the report.
example_translation: Upewnij się, że liczby mogą się sumować przed złożeniem raportu.

definition: Appear to be or give the impression of being.
example: He seemed to understand the concept well.
example_translation: Wydawał się dobrze rozumieć koncepcję.

definition: To subtract or take away an amount from a total.
example: You can deduct expenses from your income.
example_translation: Możesz odjąć wydatki od swoich dochodów.

definition: The numerical amount, quantity, or range of something.
example: The values in the dataset vary greatly.
example_translation: Wartości w zestawie danych różnią się znacznie.

definition: Elements, features, or factors that are liable to vary or change.
example: In an experiment, variables must be carefully controlled.
example_translation: W eksperymencie zmienne muszą być starannie kontrolowane.

definition: The rate or frequency of occurrence of something.
example: The incidence of flu cases has increased this year.
example_translation: Częstość występowania przypadków grypy wzrosła w tym roku.

definition: At short intervals; regularly or habitually.
example: She frequently travels for work.
example_translation: Często podróżuje służbowo.

definition: Happens or takes place.
example: An error occurs when the program fails to run.
example_translation: Błąd występuje, gdy program nie uruchamia się.

definition: The great size or extent of something.
example: The magnitude of the earthquake was 7.0 on the Richter scale.
example_translation: Wielkość trzęsienia ziemi wynosiła 7,0 w skali Richtera.

definition: A class in a system of classification determined by size or magnitude.
example: The estimates are within an order of magnitude of each other.
example_translation: Szacunki mieszczą się w tej samej kolejności wielkości.

definition: The process of using mathematics to find an answer.
example: Making calculations is essential in engineering.
example_translation: Dokonywanie obliczeń jest niezbędne w inżynierii.

definition: Approximately correct or within a close range.
example: Your estimate is in the right area.
example_translation: Twoje oszacowanie jest we właściwym obszarze.

definition: Recommended or suggested.
example: You are advised to read the manual carefully.
example_translation: Zaleca się dokładne przeczytanie instrukcji.

definition: Display the steps taken to reach a final answer.
example: Always show the workings in your math homework.
example_translation: Zawsze pokazuj obliczenia w pracy domowej z matematyki.

definition: Reached a conclusion or solution.
example: They arrived at their answer after hours of discussion.
example_translation: Doszli do odpowiedzi po godzinach dyskusji.

definition: To determine by calculation.
example: You need to work out the total cost.
example_translation: Musisz obliczyć całkowity koszt.

word: Make a rough guess at = estimate
definition: To make an approximate calculation or judgment.
example: Try to make a rough guess at the number of attendees.
example_translation: Spróbuj oszacować liczbę uczestników.

word: Make a fraction, eg. 1/4 into the nearest whole number = round up/down
definition: Adjust a fraction to the nearest whole number either up or down.
example: Round 3/4 up to 1.
example_translation: Zaokrąglij 3/4 do 1.

definition: To sum or calculate the total.
example: Add up all the expenses to get the total.
example_translation: Zsumuj wszystkie wydatki, aby uzyskać sumę.

definition: To correspond or agree with the total.
example: The numbers on both reports should tally.
example_translation: Liczby w obu raportach powinny się zgadzać.

definition: To remove an amount from a total.
example: Deduct the discount from the total price.
example_translation: Odejmij rabat od całkowitej ceny.

definition: An approximate calculation or judgment.
example: Make a rough guess of how many people will come.
example_translation: Oszacuj, ile osób przyjdzie.

word: Approximately the same = in the right area
definition: Close to or similar in amount or value.
example: The two estimates are in the right area.
example_translation: Te dwa szacunki są mniej więcej tyle samo.

word: All the calculations leading up to an answer = workings
definition: The steps or processes used to arrive at an answer.
example: Show your workings to explain how you got the answer.
example_translation: Pokaż swoje działania, aby wyjaśnić, jak doszedłeś do odpowiedzi.

definition: Adjust the number 6.66 to the nearest whole number.
example: Round up 6.66 to 7.
example_translation: Zaokrąglij 6,66 do 7.

definition: A long essay on a particular subject, especially one written for a university degree.
example: She is writing her dissertation on medieval literature.
example_translation: Pisze swoją rozprawę o literaturze średniowiecznej.

definition: To present or propose something for consideration or judgment.
example: Please submit your assignment by Friday.
example_translation: Proszę przesłać swoje zadanie do piątku.

definition: In a way that is clear enough to read.
example: Please write legibly so the teacher can read your answers.
example_translation: Proszę pisać czytelnie, aby nauczyciel mógł przeczytać twoje odpowiedzi.

definition: To recognize or point out the difference between similar things.
example: It's important to distinguish between fact and opinion.
example_translation: Ważne jest, aby rozróżniać fakty od opinii.
